location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: The papers in the file are arranged chronologically. There are file notes at the end, on folios 18-19. The notes are arranged chronologically and refer to documents within the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 20; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence and telegrams between the Political Agent at Bahrain, the Political Residency in the Persian Gulf, the Governor of Aden and Bahrain Petroleum Company Limited (BAPCO) representatives; regarding a visit of two Adenese policemen to Bahrain to investigate on a crime, and arrangements for their repatriation.
